QuestData.Title: The Translated Tome
QuestData.Description: Here it is, $n. I have translated everything printed upon the pages of the tome. Inside it you will find a list of the names of Cult of the Damned members spanning the entire continent.$B$BTheir network of spies and operatives is impressive, to say the least.$B$BFarewell, friend. May the book serve you and your people well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Translated Flesh-bound Tome to Captain Gort at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's about time! Where have you been?
QuestData.RewardText: <Gort takes the tome from you and begins reading.>$B$BWHAT! This can't be right. I've known some of these orcs for years!$B$BLeave me, $n. I have much work to do and many traitors to execute.$B$BTake one of these items for your trouble. You've done a great service for the Horde this day.
